explains: n. 转变；转向；突然好转；回车道
wordGroup: turnaround time 周转时间；转回时间

sentences.en: The agency should reduce turnaround time by 11 percent.
sentences.cn: 这家代理机构应削减11%的周转时间。

sentences.en: The company has been enjoying a turnaround in recent months.
sentences.cn: 这家公司在最近几个月里突然好转起来。

sentences.en: I have personally never done such a complete turnaround in my opinion of a person.
sentences.cn: 我个人在对一个人的评价上从没有过如此彻底的转变。
